choices.C: Switch B, because it has the highest MAC address
choices.D: Switch C, because it is the most centrally located switch
choices.F: Switch D, because it has the highest priority E
choices.B: Switch A, because it is the most centrally located switch
choices.A: Switch A, because it has the lowest MAC address
choices.E: Switch C, because it has the lowest priority

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit. Based on the information given, which switch will be elected root bridge and why?
//IMG//

discussion.content: E, lowest priority is preferred as root bridge
D would only be correct if the subnet mask was 255.255.255.0, but because it is 255.255.240.0 it is pulling from the other octet.

questions.answer_description: For this example, the network range is 172.16.16.1 - 172.16.31.254, the network address is 172.16.16.0 and the broadcast IP address is 172.16.31.255.
questions.question_text: Given an IP address 172.16.28.252 with a subnet mask of 255.255.240.0, what is the correct network address?

An administrator is unsuccessful in adding VLAN 50 to a switch. While troubleshooting the problem, the administrator views the output of the show vtp status command, which is displayed in the graphic. What commands must be issued on this switch to add VLAN 50 to the database? (Choose two.)
//IMG//

discussion.content:
Answer B is ok, but the syntax is wrong. It should be: 
Switch(config)# vtp mode server

questions.question_text:
Refer to the exhibit. How many broadcast domains exist in the exhibited topology?
//IMG//

discussion.content: is the vlan trunk a bcast domain aswell, since its a separate network>

choices.C: Switch1 will add 000A.8A47.E612 to the switching table.
choices.B: Switch1 will add 192.168.23.4 to the switching table.
choices.A: Switch1 will add 192.168.23.12 to the switching table.

questions.question_text:
On a network of one department, there are four PCs connected to a switch, as shown in the following figure: After the Switch1 restarts. Host A (the host on the left) sends the first frame to Host C (the host on the right). What the first thing should the switch do?
//IMG//
